description: This is the main source file of a Flutter app implementing a Tic Tac Toe game with a customized Ocean-themed UI. It includes the main app widget, game state management, UI components for rendering the game board, header, score display, and controls, as well as handling game logic such as move validation, win/draw detection, and score keeping.

classes.name: TicTacToeApp
classes.description: Root widget configuring theme and home page for the Tic Tac Toe game.

classes.name: GamePage
classes.description: Main game page widget containing game state, UI rendering, and game logic.

methods.name: main
methods.description: Application entry point, initializes the app.

methods.name: TicTacToeApp's build
methods.description: Builds the MaterialApp with theming and home page set to GamePage.

methods.name: GamePage's createState
methods.description: Creates mutable state for the GamePage widget.

methods.name: _GamePageState's initState
methods.description: Initializes animation controllers for game effects.

methods.name: newGame
methods.description: Starts a new game round, resetting the board but keeping scores.

methods.name: resetAll
methods.description: Resets the entire game including scores.

methods.name: _nextStarter
methods.description: Determines which player starts the next round.

methods.name: _handleTap
methods.description: Handles user tapping a cell, updating game state.

methods.name: _evaluateBoard
methods.description: Checks game board for a win or draw condition.

methods.name: _playerLabel
methods.description: Converts Player enum to display string.

methods.name: _playerColor
methods.description: Returns color associated with a player.
